description: Aspose.Imaging for .NET is an imaging library that lets developers create, edit, draw or convert images in their .NET applications. Aspose.Imaging provides features that go beyond the native capabilities of the development platform. It works independent of other applications and although Aspose.Imaging allows you to save to Adobe PhotoShop® format (PSD), you do not need PhotoShop on the machine.
releaseNotes:
Aspose.Imaging for .Net has been updated to version 2.6.0 and we are pleased to announce it
      Aspose.Imaging for .Net has been updated to version 2.6.0 and we are pleased to announce it.
      The following is a list of changes in this version of Aspose.Imaging.
      
      New features:
      IMAGING-34333 Provide conversion between Color and CMYKColor
      IMAGING-34280 Resize Image proportionally with Image.Resize method
      IMAGING-34275 CAD to Raster Image Conversion
      IMAGING-33905 Support for Binary DXF to be converted to PDF
      IMAGING-33706 Conversion to BW or grayscale
      IMAGING-33705 Support for brightness, contrast and gamma update for a specific raster image
      IMAGING-33574 TIFF Codec does not support Deflate compression method
      IMAGING-33763 TIFF Codec does not support AdobeDeflate compression method
      
      Enhancements:
      IMAGING-34175 Loaded pixels differs from sample
      IMAGING-34330 [Investigation Required] TIFF (Old JPEG) problem, possibly related to JPEGProc field
      IMAGING-34328 Incorrect result when Jpeg is converted to PNG
      IMAGING-34318 Re-saving the TIFF image with CCITT4 compression renders in black image
      IMAGING-34296 [Dxf to Pdf] Provide an exception when user tries to render incompatible DXF format
      IMAGING-34293 [CAD to PDF] Setting PdfOptions.CenterDrawing to true does not take effect
      IMAGING-34271 DWG to PDF: Chinese character are not converted correctly
      IMAGING-34268 Incorrect results when PNG is converted to JPG
      IMAGING-34259 Apparently damaged image generated by Imaging.
      IMAGING-34229 Fix problem with dimensions
      IMAGING-34219 Improve jpeg encoding performance
      IMAGING-34210 [Cad To Pdf] Fix Mtext size estimation
      IMAGING-34152 Crop seems to work incorrectly
      
      Exceptions
      IMAGING-34324 TiffImage.Save throws NotSupportedException: TiffDeflate encoder finish method support only rowsPerStrip rows
      IMAGING-34322 TiffImageException: Cannot decode strip 0. Details: There is no more data to read, at Image.Save
      IMAGING-34298 Object reference not set to an instance of an object, at Image.Save while converting JPEG to TIFF
      IMAGING-34289 NullReferenceException at Image.Resize for Jpeg image
      IMAGING-34283 ImageLoadException: "Cannot open an image. The image file format may be not supported at the moment, while loading a JPEG
      IMAGING-34277 ImageSaveException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object, at Image.Save
      IMAGING-34276 ImageException: Input string was not in a correct format, at Image.Load
      IMAGING-34274 Image export failed: Index was outside the bounds of the array, while exporting Tiff Frame to PNG format
      IMAGING-34272 DWG to PDF: System.OutOfMemoryException while saving a large DWG file
      IMAGING-34233 ImageSaveException: "Index was out of range. Must be non-negative and less than the size of the collection. Parameter name: index" at Image.Save
      IMAGING-34070 System.IndexOutOfBoundException at JpegImage.ExifData.XResolution
      
      Incompatable changes
      Classes Aspose.Imaging.ImageOptions reworked
      Enum CadIntegralParamType renamed to CadIntegralParameterType. Use new definition CadIntegralParameterType
      StreamContainer.Seek parameter changed from System.IO.SeekOrigin to Aspose.Imaging.SeekOrigin
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadParameters.CadParameter.Setted renamed to Property CadParameter.Setted renamed to CadParameter.IsSet
      Obsolete functions and metods are removed
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadParameters.CadBoolParameter.Init(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadEntityAttribute,System.String)
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadParameters.CadBoolParameter.Init(System.String)
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadParameters.CadDoubleParameter.Init(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadEntityAttribute,System.String)
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadParameters.CadDoubleParameter.Init(System.String)
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadParameters.CadIntParameter.Init(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadEntityAttribute,System.String)
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadParameters.CadIntParameter.Init(System.String)
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadParameters.CadLongParameter.Init(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadEntityAttribute,System.String)
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadParameters.CadLongParameter.Init(System.String)
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadParameters.CadParameter.Init(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadEntityAttribute,System.String)
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadParameters.CadParameter.Init(System.String)
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadParameters.CadParameter.Write(System.IO.StreamWriter,Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadEntityAttribute,System.String)
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadParameters.CadShortParameter.Init(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadEntityAttribute,System.String)
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadParameters.CadShortParameter.Init(System.String)
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadParameters.CadStringParameter.Init(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadEntityAttribute,System.String)
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadParameters.CadStringParameter.Init(System.String)

      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadObjects.CadBase.GetDouble(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadEntityAttribute,Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadConsts.CadParameterType)
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadObjects.CadBase.GetDouble(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadEntityAttribute,System.Int32)
      Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadObjects.CadBase.GetDouble(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadEntityAttribute,System.Int32,Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Cad.CadConsts.CadParameterType)
